106 /* DesignId : MMWL_DesignId_009 */
107 /* Requirements : AUTORADAR_REQ-752, AUTORADAR_REQ-757 */
108 rlReturnVal_t rlSetChannelConfig(rlUInt8_t deviceMap, rlChanCfg_t* data)
109 {
110  rlReturnVal_t retVal;
111 
112  /* check if deviceIndex is out of defined value */
113  if ((rlDriverIsDeviceMapValid(deviceMap) != RL_RET_CODE_OK) || (RL_NULL_PTR == data))
114  {
115  /* set return error code */
116  retVal = RL_RET_CODE_INVALID_INPUT;
117  }
118  else
119  {
120  /* Package the command with given data and send it to device */
121  retVal = rlDriverExecuteSetApi(deviceMap, RL_RF_STATIC_CONF_SET_MSG,
122  RL_RF_CHAN_CONF_SB, (rlUInt8_t*)data,
123  (rlUInt16_t)sizeof(rlChanCfg_t));
124  }
125 
126  RL_LOGV_ARG0("rlSetChannelConfig ends...\n");
127  return retVal;
128 
129 }

153 rlReturnVal_t rlSetAdcOutConfig(rlUInt8_t deviceMap, rlAdcOutCfg_t* data)
154 {
155  rlReturnVal_t retVal;
156 
157  RL_LOGV_ARG0("rlSetAdcOutConfig starts...\n");
158 
159  /* check if deviceIndex is out of defined value */
160  if ((rlDriverIsDeviceMapValid(deviceMap) != RL_RET_CODE_OK) || \
161  (RL_NULL_PTR == data))
162  {
163  /* set return error code */
164  retVal = RL_RET_CODE_INVALID_INPUT;
165  RL_LOGE_ARG0("rlSetAdcOutConfig, Invalid device map\n");
166  }
167  else
168  {
169  /* Package the command with given data and send it to device */
170  retVal = rlDriverExecuteSetApi(deviceMap, RL_RF_STATIC_CONF_SET_MSG,
171  RL_RF_ADCOUT_CONF_SB, (rlUInt8_t*)data,
172  (rlUInt16_t)sizeof(rlAdcOutCfg_t));
173  }
174 
175  RL_LOGV_ARG0("rlSetAdcOutConfig ends...\n");
176 
177  return retVal;
178 }

282 /* DesignId : MMWL_DesignId_122 */
283 /* Requirements : AUTORADAR_REQ-727 */
284 rlReturnVal_t rlSetMultiBpmChirpConfig(rlUInt8_t deviceMap, rlUInt16_t cnt,
285  rlBpmChirpCfg_t** data)
286 {
287  rlReturnVal_t retVal;
288  RL_LOGV_ARG0("rlSetMultiBpmChirpConfig starts...\n");
289 
290  /* check if deviceIndex is out of defined value */
291  if ((rlDriverIsDeviceMapValid(deviceMap) != RL_RET_CODE_OK) || (RL_NULL_PTR == data) || \
292  (cnt == 0U))
293  {
294  /* set return error code */
295  retVal = RL_RET_CODE_INVALID_INPUT;
296  }
297  else
298  {
299  /* Initialize Command and Response Sub Blocks */
300  rlDriverMsg_t inMsg;
301  rlDriverMsg_t outMsg = {0};
302 
303  /* Index and other paramerters to send multiple sub blocks in one/more commands chunk */
304  rlUInt16_t sbLen, maxSbCntInMsg, sbCntInMsg, numChnkOfMsg, lastSbCntInMsg, loopCnt, indx;
305 
306 
307  /* Initialize Command and Response Sub Blocks */
308  rlPayloadSb_t inPayloadSb[RL_CMD_PL_LEN_MAX/(sizeof(rlBpmChirpCfg_t) + \
309  RL_SBC_ID_SIZE + RL_SBC_LEN_SIZE)];
310 
311  /* single sub-block length for chirp config API */
312  sbLen = (rlUInt16_t)(sizeof(rlBpmChirpCfg_t) + (RL_SBC_LEN_SIZE + RL_SBC_ID_SIZE));
313 
314  /* get Max Sub Block count */
315  /* AR_CODE_REVIEW MR:D.4.1 <APPROVED> "sbLen can not be zero" */
316  /*LDRA_INSPECTED 127 D */
317  maxSbCntInMsg = (RL_CMD_PL_LEN_MAX /sbLen);
318 
319  retVal = RL_RET_CODE_OK;
320  /* if requested count of chirpConfig is within one Message packet */
321  if (cnt <= maxSbCntInMsg)
322  {
323  sbCntInMsg = cnt;
324  numChnkOfMsg = 1U;
325  lastSbCntInMsg = 0U;
326  }
327  else
328  {
329  sbCntInMsg = maxSbCntInMsg;
330  numChnkOfMsg = cnt / maxSbCntInMsg;
331  lastSbCntInMsg = cnt % maxSbCntInMsg;
332  }
333 
334  /* Fill in-message packet */
335  rlDriverConstructInMsg(RL_RF_ADVANCED_FEATURES_SET_MSG, &inMsg, &inPayloadSb[0]);
336 
337  loopCnt = (lastSbCntInMsg == 0U) ? numChnkOfMsg : (numChnkOfMsg + 1U);
338 
339  while (retVal == RL_RET_CODE_OK)
340  {
341  /* all full messages have been sent, then send last partial message */
342  if ((loopCnt == 1U) && (lastSbCntInMsg != 0U))
343  {
344  inMsg.opcode.nsbc = lastSbCntInMsg;
345  }
346  else
347  {
348  inMsg.opcode.nsbc = sbCntInMsg;
349  }
350 
351  for (indx = 0U; indx < inMsg.opcode.nsbc; indx++)
352  {
353  /* Set Command Sub Block*/
354  /* AR_CODE_REVIEW MR:R.2.2 <APPROVED> "Values are used by called function. \
355  LDRA Tool Issue" */
356  /*LDRA_INSPECTED 105 D */
357  inPayloadSb[indx].sbid = RL_GET_UNIQUE_SBID(RL_RF_ADVANCED_FEATURES_SET_MSG,
358  RL_RF_BPM_CHIRP_CONF_SB);
359  /* AR_CODE_REVIEW MR:R.2.2 <APPROVED> "Values are used by called function. \
360  LDRA Tool Issue" */
361  /*LDRA_INSPECTED 105 D */
362  inPayloadSb[indx].len = (rlUInt16_t)sizeof(rlBpmChirpCfg_t);
363  /* AR_CODE_REVIEW MR:R.2.2 <APPROVED> "Values are used by called function. \
364  LDRA Tool Issue" */
365  /*LDRA_INSPECTED 105 D */
366  inPayloadSb[indx].pSblkData = (rlUInt8_t*)(*data);
367 
368  /*AR_CODE_REVIEW MR:R.18.1 <APPROVED> "require pointer increment to jump to
369  next profile Config */
370  /*LDRA_INSPECTED 567 S */
371  data++;
372  }
373  /* Send Command to mmWave Radar Device */
374  retVal += rlDriverCmdInvoke(deviceMap, inMsg, &outMsg);
375  loopCnt--;
376 
377  if (loopCnt == 0U)
378  {
379  break;
380  }
381  }
382  }
383  RL_LOGV_ARG0("rlSetMultiBpmChirpConfig ends...\n");
384 
385  return retVal;
386 }
387 
418 /* DesignId : MMWL_DesignId_013 */
419 /* Requirements : AUTORADAR_REQ-728, AUTORADAR_REQ-729, AUTORADAR_REQ-730, AUTORADAR_REQ-731,
420  AUTORADAR_REQ-732, AUTORADAR_REQ-733, AUTORADAR_REQ-734, AUTORADAR_REQ-735,
421  AUTORADAR_REQ-736, AUTORADAR_REQ-737, AUTORADAR_REQ-738, AUTORADAR_REQ-739,
422  AUTORADAR_REQ-740, AUTORADAR_REQ-741, AUTORADAR_REQ-742, AUTORADAR_REQ-743,
423  AUTORADAR_REQ-773
424  */
425 rlReturnVal_t rlSetProfileConfig(rlUInt8_t deviceMap, rlUInt16_t cnt,
426  rlProfileCfg_t* data)
427 {
428  rlReturnVal_t retVal;
429 
430  RL_LOGV_ARG0("rlSetProfileConfig starts...\n");
431 
432  /* check if deviceIndex is out of defined value */
433  if ((rlDriverIsDeviceMapValid(deviceMap) != RL_RET_CODE_OK) || \
434  (RL_NULL_PTR == data) || (cnt == 0U))
435  {
436  /* set return error code */
437  retVal = RL_RET_CODE_INVALID_INPUT;
438  RL_LOGE_ARG0("rlSetProfileConfig, Invalid device map\n");
439  }
440  else
441  {
442  rlDriverMsg_t inMsg = {0};
443  rlDriverMsg_t outMsg = {0};
444 
445  /* Initialize Command and Response Sub Blocks */
446  rlPayloadSb_t inPayloadSb[RL_CMD_PL_LEN_MAX/(sizeof(rlProfileCfg_t) + \
447  RL_SBC_ID_SIZE + RL_SBC_LEN_SIZE)];
448  /* Variable to count message chunks */
449  rlUInt16_t indx;
450  rlUInt16_t sbCntInAllChunk = 0U;
451  rlUInt16_t maxSbInMsg = (RL_CMD_PL_LEN_MAX /(sizeof(rlProfileCfg_t) + \
452  RL_SBC_ID_SIZE + RL_SBC_LEN_SIZE));
453 
454  /* Construct command packet */
455  rlDriverConstructInMsg(RL_RF_DYNAMIC_CONF_SET_MSG, &inMsg, &inPayloadSb[0]);
456 
457  retVal = RL_RET_CODE_OK;
458  /* Loop to copy all the command data to one message */
459  for (indx = 0U; (indx < cnt) && (retVal == RL_RET_CODE_OK); indx++)
460  {
461  /* Fill in-message payload */
462  /*AR_CODE_REVIEW MR:R.18.1 <APPROVED> "require pointer increment to jump to
463  next profile Config */
464  /*AR_CODE_REVIEW MR:R.18.4 <APPROVED> "require pointer increment to jump to
465  next profile Config */
466  /*LDRA_INSPECTED 87 S */
467  /*LDRA_INSPECTED 567 S */
468  rlDriverFillPayload(RL_RF_DYNAMIC_CONF_SET_MSG, RL_RF_PROFILE_CONF_SB,
469  &inPayloadSb[indx], (rlUInt8_t*)(data + indx),
470  (rlUInt16_t)sizeof(rlProfileCfg_t));
471 
472  /* increment Sub-block count in one packet */
473  sbCntInAllChunk++;
474 
475  /* check if total payload length is going beyond defined limitation */
476  if ((maxSbInMsg == (indx + 1U)) || (cnt == sbCntInAllChunk))
477  {
478  /* setting of numSBC to inMsg */
479  inMsg.opcode.nsbc = (indx + 1U);
480  /* Send Command to mmWave Radar Device */
481  retVal += rlDriverCmdInvoke(deviceMap, inMsg, &outMsg);
482  }
483  }
484  }
485 
486  RL_LOGV_ARG0("rlSetProfileConfig ends...\n");
487 
488  return retVal;
489 }
490 
504 /* DesignId : MMWL_DesignId_118 */
505 /* Requirements : AUTORADAR_REQ-728, AUTORADAR_REQ-729, AUTORADAR_REQ-730, AUTORADAR_REQ-731,
506 AUTORADAR_REQ-732, AUTORADAR_REQ-733, AUTORADAR_REQ-734, AUTORADAR_REQ-735,
507 AUTORADAR_REQ-736, AUTORADAR_REQ-737, AUTORADAR_REQ-738, AUTORADAR_REQ-739,
508 AUTORADAR_REQ-740, AUTORADAR_REQ-741, AUTORADAR_REQ-742, AUTORADAR_REQ-743,
509 AUTORADAR_REQ-773
510 */
511 rlReturnVal_t rlGetProfileConfig(rlUInt8_t deviceMap, rlUInt16_t profileId, rlProfileCfg_t* data)
512 {
513  rlReturnVal_t retVal;
514 
515  RL_LOGV_ARG0("rlGetProfileConfig ends...\n");
516 
517  /* check if deviceIndex is out of defined value */
518  if ((rlDriverIsDeviceMapValid(deviceMap) != RL_RET_CODE_OK) || \
519  (RL_NULL_PTR == data))
520  {
521  /* set return error code */
522  retVal = RL_RET_CODE_INVALID_INPUT;
523  RL_LOGE_ARG0("rlGetProfileConfig, Invalid device map\n");
524  }
525  else
526  {
527  /* Initialize Command and Response Sub Blocks */
528  rlDriverMsg_t inMsg = {0};
529  rlDriverMsg_t outMsg = {0};
530  rlPayloadSb_t inPayloadSb = {0};
531  rlPayloadSb_t outPayloadSb = {0};
532  rlWordParam_t wordParam;
533  /* combine half words into WORD structure */
534  wordParam.halfWordOne = profileId;
535  wordParam.halfWordTwo = 0U;
536 
537  /* Construct command packet */
538  rlDriverConstructInMsg(RL_RF_DYNAMIC_CONF_GET_MSG, &inMsg, &inPayloadSb);
539  /* Fill in-message Payload */
540  rlDriverFillPayload(RL_RF_DYNAMIC_CONF_GET_MSG, RL_RF_PROFILE_CONF_SB, &inPayloadSb,
541  (rlUInt8_t*)&wordParam, (rlUInt16_t)sizeof(rlWordParam_t));
542 
543  /* Construct response packet */
544  rlDriverConstructOutMsg(1U, &outMsg, &outPayloadSb);
545  /* Fill in-message Payload */
546  rlDriverFillPayload(0U, 0U, &outPayloadSb, (rlUInt8_t*)data, 0U);
547 
548  /* Send Command to mmWave Radar Device */
549  retVal = rlDriverCmdInvoke(deviceMap, inMsg, &outMsg);
550  }
551 
552  RL_LOGV_ARG0("rlGetProfileConfig ends...\n");
553  return retVal;
554 }
555 
580 /* DesignId : MMWL_DesignId_014 */
581 /* Requirements : AUTORADAR_REQ-744, AUTORADAR_REQ-745, AUTORADAR_REQ-746, AUTORADAR_REQ-747,
582  AUTORADAR_REQ-748, AUTORADAR_REQ-749, AUTORADAR_REQ-750, AUTORADAR_REQ-751,
583  AUTORADAR_REQ-773
584  */
585 rlReturnVal_t rlSetChirpConfig(rlUInt8_t deviceMap, rlUInt16_t cnt, rlChirpCfg_t* data)
586 {
587  rlReturnVal_t retVal;
588 
589  RL_LOGV_ARG0("rlSetChirpConfig starts...\n");
590 
591  /* check if deviceIndex is out of defined value */
592  if ((rlDriverIsDeviceMapValid(deviceMap) != RL_RET_CODE_OK) || \
593  (RL_NULL_PTR == data) || (cnt == 0U))
594  {
595  /* set return error code */
596  retVal = RL_RET_CODE_INVALID_INPUT;
597  }
598  else
599  {
600  /* Initialize Command and Response Sub Blocks */
601  rlDriverMsg_t inMsg;
602  rlDriverMsg_t outMsg = {0};
603  /* Index and other paramerters to send multiple sub blocks in one/more commands chunk */
604  rlUInt16_t sbLen, maxSbCntInMsg, sbCntInMsg, numChnkOfMsg, lastSbCntInMsg, loopCnt, indx;
605 
606  /* Initialize Command and Response Sub Blocks */
607  rlPayloadSb_t inPayloadSb[RL_CMD_PL_LEN_MAX/(sizeof(rlChirpCfg_t) + \
608  RL_SBC_ID_SIZE + RL_SBC_LEN_SIZE)];
609 
610  /* single sub-block length for chirp config API */
611  sbLen = (rlUInt16_t)(sizeof(rlChirpCfg_t) + (RL_SBC_LEN_SIZE + RL_SBC_ID_SIZE));
612 
613  /* get Max Sub Block count */
614  /* AR_CODE_REVIEW MR:D.4.1 <APPROVED> "sbLen can not be zero" */
615  /*LDRA_INSPECTED 127 D */
616  maxSbCntInMsg = (RL_CMD_PL_LEN_MAX /sbLen);
617 
618  retVal = RL_RET_CODE_OK;
619  /* if requested count of chirpConfig is within one Message packet */
620  if (cnt <= maxSbCntInMsg)
621  {
622  sbCntInMsg = cnt;
623  numChnkOfMsg = 1U;
624  lastSbCntInMsg = 0U;
625  }
626  else
627  {
628  sbCntInMsg = maxSbCntInMsg;
629  numChnkOfMsg = cnt / maxSbCntInMsg;
630  lastSbCntInMsg = cnt % maxSbCntInMsg;
631  }
632 
633  /* Fill in-message packet */
634  rlDriverConstructInMsg(RL_RF_DYNAMIC_CONF_SET_MSG, &inMsg, &inPayloadSb[0]);
635  /* get the loop count in form of number of msg chunks */
636  loopCnt = (lastSbCntInMsg == 0U) ? numChnkOfMsg : (numChnkOfMsg + 1U);
637 
638  while (retVal == RL_RET_CODE_OK)
639  {
640  /* all full messages have been sent, then send last partial message */
641  if ((loopCnt == 1U) && (lastSbCntInMsg != 0U))
642  {
643  inMsg.opcode.nsbc = lastSbCntInMsg;
644  }
645  else
646  {
647  inMsg.opcode.nsbc = sbCntInMsg;
648  }
649 
650  for (indx = 0U; indx < inMsg.opcode.nsbc; indx++)
651  {
652  /* Set Command Sub Block*/
653  /* AR_CODE_REVIEW MR:R.2.2 <APPROVED> "Values are used by called function. \
654  LDRA Tool Issue" */
655  /*LDRA_INSPECTED 105 D */
656  inPayloadSb[indx].sbid = RL_GET_UNIQUE_SBID(RL_RF_DYNAMIC_CONF_SET_MSG,
657  RL_RF_CHIRP_CONF_SB);
658  /* AR_CODE_REVIEW MR:R.2.2 <APPROVED> "Values are used by called function. \
659  LDRA Tool Issue" */
660  /*LDRA_INSPECTED 105 D */
661  inPayloadSb[indx].len = (rlUInt16_t)sizeof(rlChirpCfg_t);
662  /* AR_CODE_REVIEW MR:R.2.2 <APPROVED> "Values are used by called function. \
663  LDRA Tool Issue" */
664  /*LDRA_INSPECTED 105 D */
665  inPayloadSb[indx].pSblkData = (rlUInt8_t*)(data);
666  /*AR_CODE_REVIEW MR:R.18.1 <APPROVED> "require pointer increment to jump to \
667  next chirp Config */
668  /*LDRA_INSPECTED 567 S */
669  data++;
670  }
671  /* Send Command to mmWave Radar Device */
672  /* AR_CODE_REVIEW MR:R.2.2 <APPROVED> "Values are used by called function. \
673  LDRA Tool Issue" */
674  /*LDRA_INSPECTED 105 D */
675  retVal += rlDriverCmdInvoke(deviceMap, inMsg, &outMsg);
676  /* decrement the loop count */
677  loopCnt--;
678  /* if all chirp configurations have been sent to device then terminate the loop */
679  if (loopCnt == 0U)
680  {
681  break;
682  }
683  }
684  }
685 
686  RL_LOGV_ARG0("rlSetChirpConfig ends...\n");
687 
688  return retVal;
689 }
690 
704 /* DesignId : MMWL_DesignId_119 */
705 /* Requirements : AUTORADAR_REQ-744, AUTORADAR_REQ-745, AUTORADAR_REQ-746, AUTORADAR_REQ-747,
706 AUTORADAR_REQ-748, AUTORADAR_REQ-749, AUTORADAR_REQ-750, AUTORADAR_REQ-751,
707 AUTORADAR_REQ-773
708 */
709 rlReturnVal_t rlGetChirpConfig(rlUInt8_t deviceMap, rlUInt16_t chirpStartIdx,
710  rlUInt16_t chirpEndIdx, rlChirpCfg_t* data)
711 {
712  rlReturnVal_t retVal;
713  rlChirpCfg_t *chirpCfgData = data;
714 
715  RL_LOGV_ARG0("rlGetChirpConfig starts...\n");
716 
717  /* check if deviceIndex is out of defined value */
718  if ((rlDriverIsDeviceMapValid(deviceMap) != RL_RET_CODE_OK) || \
719  (RL_NULL_PTR == chirpCfgData))
720  {
721  /* set return error code */
722  retVal = RL_RET_CODE_INVALID_INPUT;
723  RL_LOGE_ARG0("rlGetChirpConfig, Invalid device map\n");
724  }
725  else
726  {
727  /* Initialize Command and Response Sub Blocks */
728  rlDriverMsg_t inMsg = {0};
729  rlDriverMsg_t outMsg = {0};
730  /* Index and other paramerters to send multiple sub blocks in one/more commands chunk */
731  rlUInt16_t sbLen, maxSbCntOutMsg, sbCntOutMsg, numChnkOfMsg, lastSbCntOutMsg, loopCnt;
732 
733  /* file chirp start and end index */
734  rlWordParam_t wordParam;
735 
736  rlPayloadSb_t inPayloadSb = {0};
737  rlPayloadSb_t outPayloadSb;
738 
739  /* single sub-block length for chirp config API */
740  sbLen = (rlUInt16_t)(sizeof(rlChirpCfg_t));
741 
742  /* get Max Sub Block count */
743  /* AR_CODE_REVIEW MR:D.4.1 <APPROVED> "sbLen can not be zero" */
744  /*LDRA_INSPECTED 127 D */
745  maxSbCntOutMsg = (RL_CMD_PL_LEN_MAX -(RL_SBC_LEN_SIZE + RL_SBC_ID_SIZE)) /sbLen;
746 
747  retVal = RL_RET_CODE_OK;
748  /* if requested count of chirpConfig is within one Message packet */
749  if ((chirpEndIdx - chirpStartIdx + 1U) <= maxSbCntOutMsg)
750  {
751  sbCntOutMsg = (chirpEndIdx - chirpStartIdx + 1U);
752  numChnkOfMsg = 0U;
753  lastSbCntOutMsg = 0U;
754  }
755  else
756  {
757  sbCntOutMsg = maxSbCntOutMsg;
758  numChnkOfMsg = (chirpEndIdx - chirpStartIdx + 1U) / maxSbCntOutMsg;
759  lastSbCntOutMsg = (chirpEndIdx - chirpStartIdx + 1U) % maxSbCntOutMsg;
760  }
761  /* set chirp start index to inMsg field */
762  /* AR_CODE_REVIEW MR:R.2.2 <APPROVED> "required to intial with startIdx" */
763  /*LDRA_INSPECTED 8 D */
764  wordParam.halfWordTwo = chirpStartIdx;
765 
766  /* get the loop count in form of number of msg chunks */
767  loopCnt = numChnkOfMsg + 1U;
768  /* setting num of sub-block to one in outMsg */
769  outMsg.opcode.nsbc = 1U;
770 
771  while (retVal == RL_RET_CODE_OK)
772  {
773  /* combine half words into WORD structure */
774  wordParam.halfWordOne = wordParam.halfWordTwo;
775  /* all full messages have been sent, then send last partial message */
776  if ((loopCnt == 1U) && (lastSbCntOutMsg != 0U))
777  {
778  wordParam.halfWordTwo = wordParam.halfWordOne + (lastSbCntOutMsg - 1U);
779  }
780  else
781  {
782  wordParam.halfWordTwo = wordParam.halfWordOne + (sbCntOutMsg - 1U);
783  }
784 
785  /* Construct command packet */
786  rlDriverConstructInMsg(RL_RF_DYNAMIC_CONF_GET_MSG, &inMsg, &inPayloadSb);
787  /* Fill in-message Payload */
788  rlDriverFillPayload(RL_RF_DYNAMIC_CONF_GET_MSG, RL_RF_CHIRP_CONF_SB, &inPayloadSb,
789  (rlUInt8_t*)&wordParam, (rlUInt16_t)sizeof(rlWordParam_t));
790 
791  /* Set Command Sub Block*/
792  outPayloadSb.sbid = RL_GET_UNIQUE_SBID(RL_RF_DYNAMIC_CONF_GET_MSG,
793  RL_RF_CHIRP_CONF_SB);
794  outPayloadSb.len = (rlUInt16_t)sizeof(rlChirpCfg_t);
795  outPayloadSb.pSblkData = (rlUInt8_t*)(chirpCfgData);
796 
797  /* Construct response packet */
798  rlDriverConstructOutMsg(outMsg.opcode.nsbc, &outMsg, &outPayloadSb);
799 
800  /* Send Command to mmWave Radar Device */
801  retVal += rlDriverCmdInvoke(deviceMap, inMsg, &outMsg);
802 
803  /* increment data pointer for next chunk of reponse */
804  chirpCfgData += sbCntOutMsg;
805 
806  /* decrement the loop count */
807  loopCnt--;
808  wordParam.halfWordTwo++;
809  /* if all chirp configurations have been sent to device then terminate the loop */
810  if (loopCnt == 0U)
811  {
812  break;
813  }
814  }
815  }
816 
817  RL_LOGV_ARG0("rlGetChirpConfig ends...\n");
818 
819  return retVal;
820 }
821 
822 
847 rlReturnVal_t rlSetMultiChirpCfg(rlUInt8_t deviceMap, rlUInt16_t cnt,
848  rlChirpCfg_t **data)
849 {
850  rlReturnVal_t retVal;
851  RL_LOGV_ARG0("rlSetMultiChirpCfg starts...\n");
852 
853  /* check if deviceIndex is out of defined value */
854  if ((rlDriverIsDeviceMapValid(deviceMap) != RL_RET_CODE_OK) || (RL_NULL_PTR == data) || \
855  (cnt == 0U))
856  {
857  /* set return error code */
858  retVal = RL_RET_CODE_INVALID_INPUT;
859  }
860  else
861  {
862  /* Initialize Command and Response Sub Blocks */
863  rlDriverMsg_t inMsg;
864  rlDriverMsg_t outMsg = {0};
865 
866  /* Index and other paramerters to send multiple sub blocks in one/more commands chunk */
867  rlUInt16_t sbLen, maxSbCntInMsg, sbCntInMsg, numChnkOfMsg, lastSbCntInMsg, loopCnt, indx;
868 
869 
870  /* Initialize Command and Response Sub Blocks */
871  rlPayloadSb_t inPayloadSb[RL_CMD_PL_LEN_MAX/(sizeof(rlChirpCfg_t) + \
872  RL_SBC_ID_SIZE + RL_SBC_LEN_SIZE)];
873 
874  /* single sub-block length for chirp config API */
875  sbLen = (rlUInt16_t)(sizeof(rlChirpCfg_t) + (RL_SBC_LEN_SIZE + RL_SBC_ID_SIZE));
876 
877 
878  /* get Max Sub Block count */
879  /* AR_CODE_REVIEW MR:D.4.1 <APPROVED> "sbLen can not be zero" */
880  /*LDRA_INSPECTED 127 D */
881  maxSbCntInMsg = (RL_CMD_PL_LEN_MAX /sbLen);
882 
883  retVal = RL_RET_CODE_OK;
884  /* if requested count of chirpConfig is within one Message packet */
885  if (cnt <= maxSbCntInMsg)
886  {
887  sbCntInMsg = cnt;
888  numChnkOfMsg = 1U;
889  lastSbCntInMsg = 0U;
890  }
891  else
892  {
893  sbCntInMsg = maxSbCntInMsg;
894  numChnkOfMsg = cnt / maxSbCntInMsg;
895  lastSbCntInMsg = cnt % maxSbCntInMsg;
896  }
897 
898  /* Fill in-message packet */
899  rlDriverConstructInMsg(RL_RF_DYNAMIC_CONF_SET_MSG, &inMsg, &inPayloadSb[0]);
900 
901  loopCnt = (lastSbCntInMsg == 0U) ? numChnkOfMsg : (numChnkOfMsg + 1U);
902 
903  while (retVal == RL_RET_CODE_OK)
904  {
905  /* all full messages have been sent, then send last partial message */
906  if ((loopCnt == 1U) && (lastSbCntInMsg != 0U))
907  {
908  inMsg.opcode.nsbc = lastSbCntInMsg;
909  }
910  else
911  {
912  inMsg.opcode.nsbc = sbCntInMsg;
913  }
914 
915  for (indx = 0U; indx < inMsg.opcode.nsbc; indx++)
916  {
917  /* Set Command Sub Block*/
918  /* AR_CODE_REVIEW MR:R.2.2 <APPROVED> "Values are used by called function. \
919  LDRA Tool Issue" */
920  /*LDRA_INSPECTED 105 D */
921  inPayloadSb[indx].sbid = RL_GET_UNIQUE_SBID(RL_RF_DYNAMIC_CONF_SET_MSG,
922  RL_RF_CHIRP_CONF_SB);
923  /* AR_CODE_REVIEW MR:R.2.2 <APPROVED> "Values are used by called function. \
924  LDRA Tool Issue" */
925  /*LDRA_INSPECTED 105 D */
926  inPayloadSb[indx].len = (rlUInt16_t)sizeof(rlChirpCfg_t);
927  /* AR_CODE_REVIEW MR:R.2.2 <APPROVED> "Values are used by called function. \
928  LDRA Tool Issue" */
929  /*LDRA_INSPECTED 105 D */
930  inPayloadSb[indx].pSblkData = (rlUInt8_t*)(*data);
931 
932  /*AR_CODE_REVIEW MR:R.18.1 <APPROVED> "require pointer increment to jump to
933  next profile Config */
934  /*LDRA_INSPECTED 567 S */
935  data++;
936  }
937  /* Send Command to mmWave Radar Device */
938  retVal += rlDriverCmdInvoke(deviceMap, inMsg, &outMsg);
939  loopCnt--;
940 
941  if (loopCnt == 0U)
942  {
943  break;
944  }
945  }
946  }
947  RL_LOGV_ARG0("rlSetMultiChirpCfg ends...\n");
948  return retVal;
949 }

1001 /* DesignId : MMWL_DesignId_015 */
1002 /* Requirements : AUTORADAR_REQ-715, AUTORADAR_REQ-716, AUTORADAR_REQ-717,
1003  AUTORADAR_REQ-718, AUTORADAR_REQ-719, AUTORADAR_REQ-720, AUTORADAR_REQ-1045 */
1004 rlReturnVal_t rlSetFrameConfig(rlUInt8_t deviceMap, rlFrameCfg_t* data)
1005 {
1006  rlReturnVal_t retVal;
1007 
1008  RL_LOGV_ARG0("rlSetFrameConfig starts...\n");
1009 
1010  /* check if deviceIndex is out of defined value */
1011  if ((rlDriverIsDeviceMapValid(deviceMap) != RL_RET_CODE_OK) || \
1012  (RL_NULL_PTR == data))
1013  {
1014  /* set return error code */
1015  retVal = RL_RET_CODE_INVALID_INPUT;
1016  RL_LOGE_ARG0("rlSetFrameConfig, Invalid device map\n");
1017  }
1018  else
1019  {
1020  /* Package the command with given data and send it to device */
1021  retVal = rlDriverExecuteSetApi(deviceMap, RL_RF_DYNAMIC_CONF_SET_MSG,
1022  RL_RF_FRAME_CONF_SB, (rlUInt8_t*)data,
1023  (rlUInt16_t)sizeof(rlFrameCfg_t));
1024 
1025  /* If only mmWaveLink instance is running on Host */
1026  if ((retVal == RL_RET_CODE_OK) && (RL_PLATFORM_HOST == rlDriverGetPlatformId()))
1027  {
1028  /* Initialize Command and Response Sub Blocks */
1029  rlDriverMsg_t inMsg = {0};
1030  rlDriverMsg_t outMsg = {0};
1031  rlPayloadSb_t inPayloadSb = {0};
1032  rlFrameApplyCfg_t frameApplyCfgArgs;
1033  rlUInt16_t tempVar;
1034  frameApplyCfgArgs.reserved = 0U;
1035  frameApplyCfgArgs.numAdcSamples = (data->numAdcSamples);
1036  tempVar = (((data->chirpEndIdx - data->chirpStartIdx) + 1U) *
1037  (data->numLoops)) - data->numDummyChirpsAtEnd;
1038 #ifndef MMWL_BIG_ENDIAN
1039  frameApplyCfgArgs.numChirps = tempVar;
1040 #else
1041  frameApplyCfgArgs.numChirps = RL_SWAP_32(tempVar);
1042 #endif
1043  /* Construct command packet */
1044  rlDriverConstructInMsg(RL_DEV_CONFIG_APPLY_MSG, &inMsg, &inPayloadSb);
1045  /* Fill in-message Payload */
1046  rlDriverFillPayload(RL_DEV_CONFIG_APPLY_MSG, RL_SYS_CONFIG_APPLY_SB,
1047  &inPayloadSb, (rlUInt8_t*)&frameApplyCfgArgs,
1048  (rlUInt16_t)sizeof(rlFrameApplyCfg_t));
1049 
1050  /* Send Command to mmWave Radar Device */
1051  retVal += rlDriverCmdInvoke(deviceMap, inMsg, &outMsg);
1052  }
1053  }
1054 
1055  RL_LOGV_ARG0("rlSetFrameConfig ends...\n");
1056 
1057  return retVal;
1058 }

1120 #ifndef MMWL_BIG_ENDIAN
1121

1123  data->numAdcSamples = frameApplyCfgArgs.numAdcSamples;
1124 #else
1125  /* update parameter received by Get Command */
1126  data->numAdcSamples = RL_SWAP_32(frameApplyCfgArgs.numAdcSamples);
1127 #endif
1128  }
1129  }
1130 
1131  RL_LOGV_ARG0("rlGetFrameConfig ends...\n");
1132 
1133  return retVal;

1443 /* DesignId : MMWL_DesignId_017 */
1444 /* Requirements : AUTORADAR_REQ-759 */
1445 rlReturnVal_t rlSensorStart(rlUInt8_t deviceMap)
1446 {
1447  rlReturnVal_t retVal;
1448 
1449  rlFrameTrigger_t frameTriggerArgs;
1450 
1451  RL_LOGV_ARG0("rlSensorStart starts...\n");
1452 
1453  frameTriggerArgs.startStop = RL_FRAME_TRIGGER_START;
1454  frameTriggerArgs.reserved = 0U;
1455 
1456  /* check if deviceIndex is out of defined value */
1457  if ((rlDriverIsDeviceMapValid(deviceMap) != RL_RET_CODE_OK))
1458  {
1459  /* set return error code */
1460  retVal = RL_RET_CODE_INVALID_INPUT;
1461  RL_LOGE_ARG0("rlSensorStart, Invalid device map\n");
1462  }
1463  else
1464  {
1465  /* Package the command with given data and send it to device */
1466  retVal = rlDriverExecuteSetApi(deviceMap, RL_RF_FRAME_TRIG_MSG,
1467  RL_RF_FRAMESTARTSTOP_CONF_SB,

1952 /* DesignId : MMWL_DesignId_045 */
1953 /* Requirements : AUTORADAR_REQ-798 */
1954 rlReturnVal_t rlRfSetPhaseShiftConfig(rlUInt8_t deviceMap, rlUInt16_t cnt,
1955  rlRfPhaseShiftCfg_t* data)
1956 {
1957  rlReturnVal_t retVal;
1958 
1959  RL_LOGV_ARG0("rlRfSetPhaseShiftConfig starts...\n");
1960 
1961  /* check if deviceIndex is out of defined value */
1962  if ((rlDriverIsDeviceMapValid(deviceMap) != RL_RET_CODE_OK) || \
1963  (RL_NULL_PTR == data) || (cnt == 0U))
1964  {
1965  /* set return error code */
1966  retVal = RL_RET_CODE_INVALID_INPUT;
1967  }
1968  else
1969  {
1970  /* Initialize Command and Response Sub Blocks */
1971  rlDriverMsg_t inMsg;
1972  rlDriverMsg_t outMsg = {0};
1973  /* Index and other paramerters to send multiple sub blocks in one/more commands chunk */
1974  rlUInt16_t sbLen, maxSbCntInMsg, sbCntInMsg, numChnkOfMsg, lastSbCntInMsg, loopCnt, indx;
1975 
1976  /* Initialize Command and Response Sub Blocks */
1977  rlPayloadSb_t inPayloadSb[RL_CMD_PL_LEN_MAX/(sizeof(rlRfPhaseShiftCfg_t) + \
1978  RL_SBC_ID_SIZE + RL_SBC_LEN_SIZE)];
1979 
1980  /* single sub-block length for chirp config API */
1981  sbLen = (rlUInt16_t)(sizeof(rlRfPhaseShiftCfg_t) + (RL_SBC_LEN_SIZE + RL_SBC_ID_SIZE));
1982 
1983  /* get Max Sub Block count */
1984  /* AR_CODE_REVIEW MR:D.4.1 <APPROVED> "sbLen can not be zero" */
1985  /*LDRA_INSPECTED 127 D */
1986  maxSbCntInMsg = (RL_CMD_PL_LEN_MAX /sbLen);
1987 
1988  retVal = RL_RET_CODE_OK;
1989  /* if requested count of chirpConfig is within one Message packet */
1990  if (cnt <= maxSbCntInMsg)
1991  {
1992  sbCntInMsg = cnt;
1993  numChnkOfMsg = 1U;
1994  lastSbCntInMsg = 0U;
1995  }
1996  else
1997  {
1998  sbCntInMsg = maxSbCntInMsg;
1999  numChnkOfMsg = cnt / maxSbCntInMsg;
2000  lastSbCntInMsg = cnt % maxSbCntInMsg;
2001  }
2002 
2003  /* Fill in-message packet */
2004  rlDriverConstructInMsg(RL_RF_DYNAMIC_CONF_SET_MSG, &inMsg, &inPayloadSb[0]);
2005  /* get the loop count in form of number of msg chunks */
2006  loopCnt = (lastSbCntInMsg == 0U) ? numChnkOfMsg : (numChnkOfMsg + 1U);
2007 
2008  while (retVal == RL_RET_CODE_OK)
2009  {
2010  /* all full messages have been sent, then send last partial message */
2011  if ((loopCnt == 1U) && (lastSbCntInMsg != 0U))
2012  {
2013  inMsg.opcode.nsbc = lastSbCntInMsg;
2014  }
2015  else
2016  {
2017  inMsg.opcode.nsbc = sbCntInMsg;
2018  }
2019 
2020  for (indx = 0U; indx < inMsg.opcode.nsbc; indx++)
2021  {
2022  /* Set Command Sub Block*/
2023  /* AR_CODE_REVIEW MR:R.2.2 <APPROVED> "Values are used by called function. \
2024  LDRA Tool Issue" */
2025  /*LDRA_INSPECTED 105 D */
2026  inPayloadSb[indx].sbid = RL_GET_UNIQUE_SBID(RL_RF_DYNAMIC_CONF_SET_MSG,
2027  RL_RF_PERCHIRPPHASESHIFT_CONF_SB);
2028  /* AR_CODE_REVIEW MR:R.2.2 <APPROVED> "Values are used by called function. \
2029  LDRA Tool Issue" */
2030  /*LDRA_INSPECTED 105 D */
2031  inPayloadSb[indx].len = (rlUInt16_t)sizeof(rlRfPhaseShiftCfg_t);
2032  /* AR_CODE_REVIEW MR:R.2.2 <APPROVED> "Values are used by called function. \
2033  LDRA Tool Issue" */
2034  /*LDRA_INSPECTED 105 D */
2035  inPayloadSb[indx].pSblkData = (rlUInt8_t*)(data);
2036  /*AR_CODE_REVIEW MR:R.18.1 <APPROVED> "require pointer increment to jump to \
2037  next chirp Config */
2038  /*LDRA_INSPECTED 567 S */
2039  data++;
2040  }
2041  /* Send Command to mmWave Radar Device */
2042  /* AR_CODE_REVIEW MR:R.2.2 <APPROVED> "Values are used by called function. \
2043  LDRA Tool Issue" */
2044  /*LDRA_INSPECTED 105 D */
2045  retVal += rlDriverCmdInvoke(deviceMap, inMsg, &outMsg);
2046  /* decrement the loop count */
2047  loopCnt--;
2048  /* if all phase shift configs have been sent to device then terminate the loop */
2049  if (loopCnt == 0U)
2050  {
2051  break;
2052  }
2053  }
2054  }
2055 
2056  RL_LOGV_ARG0("rlRfSetPhaseShiftConfig ends...\n");
2057 
2058  return retVal;
2059 }
2060

2802 /* DesignId : MMWL_DesignId_063 */
2803 /* Requirements : AUTORADAR_REQ-902 */
2804 rlReturnVal_t rlSetDynChirpCfg(rlUInt8_t deviceMap, rlUInt16_t segCnt,
2805  rlDynChirpCfg_t **data)
2806 {
2807  rlReturnVal_t retVal;
2808 
2809  /* check if deviceIndex is out of defined value */
2810  if ((rlDriverIsDeviceMapValid(deviceMap) != RL_RET_CODE_OK) || (RL_NULL_PTR == data) || \
2811  (segCnt == 0U))
2812  {
2813  /* set return error code */
2814  retVal = RL_RET_CODE_INVALID_INPUT;
2815  }
2816  else
2817  {
2818  /* Initialize Command and Response Sub Blocks */
2819  rlDriverMsg_t inMsg;
2820  rlDriverMsg_t outMsg = {0};
2821 
2822  /* Index and other paramerters to send multiple sub blocks in one/more commands chunk */
2823  rlUInt16_t sbLen, maxSbCntInMsg, sbCntInMsg, numChnkOfMsg, lastSbCntInMsg, loopCnt, indx;
2824 
2825 
2826  /* Initialize Command and Response Sub Blocks */
2827  rlPayloadSb_t inPayloadSb[RL_CMD_PL_LEN_MAX/(sizeof(rlDynChirpCfg_t) + \
2828  RL_SBC_ID_SIZE + RL_SBC_LEN_SIZE)];
2829 
2830  /* single sub-block length for chirp config API */
2831  sbLen = (rlUInt16_t)(sizeof(rlDynChirpCfg_t) + (RL_SBC_LEN_SIZE + RL_SBC_ID_SIZE));
2832 
2833 
2834  /* get Max Sub Block count */
2835  /* AR_CODE_REVIEW MR:D.4.1 <APPROVED> "sbLen can not be zero" */
2836  /*LDRA_INSPECTED 127 D */
2837  maxSbCntInMsg = (RL_CMD_PL_LEN_MAX /sbLen);
2838 
2839  retVal = RL_RET_CODE_OK;
2840  /* if requested count of chirpConfig is within one Message packet */
2841  if (segCnt <= maxSbCntInMsg)
2842  {
2843  sbCntInMsg = segCnt;
2844  numChnkOfMsg = 1U;
2845  lastSbCntInMsg = 0U;
2846  }
2847  else
2848  {
2849  sbCntInMsg = maxSbCntInMsg;
2850  numChnkOfMsg = segCnt / maxSbCntInMsg;
2851  lastSbCntInMsg = segCnt % maxSbCntInMsg;
2852  }
2853 
2854  /* Fill in-message packet */
2855  rlDriverConstructInMsg(RL_RF_DYNAMIC_CONF_SET_MSG, &inMsg, &inPayloadSb[0]);
2856 
2857  loopCnt = (lastSbCntInMsg == 0U) ? numChnkOfMsg : (numChnkOfMsg + 1U);
2858 
2859  while (retVal == RL_RET_CODE_OK)
2860  {
2861  /* all full messages have been sent, then send last partial message */
2862  if ((loopCnt == 1U) && (lastSbCntInMsg != 0U))
2863  {
2864  inMsg.opcode.nsbc = lastSbCntInMsg;
2865  }
2866  else
2867  {
2868  inMsg.opcode.nsbc = sbCntInMsg;
2869  }
2870 
2871  for (indx = 0U; indx < inMsg.opcode.nsbc; indx++)
2872  {
2873  /* Set Command Sub Block*/
2874  /* AR_CODE_REVIEW MR:R.2.2 <APPROVED> "Values are used by called function. \
2875  LDRA Tool Issue" */
2876  /*LDRA_INSPECTED 105 D */
2877  inPayloadSb[indx].sbid = RL_GET_UNIQUE_SBID(RL_RF_DYNAMIC_CONF_SET_MSG,
2878  RL_RF_DYN_CHIRP_CFG_SET_SB);
2879  /* AR_CODE_REVIEW MR:R.2.2 <APPROVED> "Values are used by called function. \
2880  LDRA Tool Issue" */
2881  /*LDRA_INSPECTED 105 D */
2882  inPayloadSb[indx].len = (rlUInt16_t)sizeof(rlDynChirpCfg_t);
2883  /* AR_CODE_REVIEW MR:R.2.2 <APPROVED> "Values are used by called function. \
2884  LDRA Tool Issue" */
2885  /*LDRA_INSPECTED 105 D */
2886  inPayloadSb[indx].pSblkData = (rlUInt8_t*)(*data);
2887 
2888  /*AR_CODE_REVIEW MR:R.18.1 <APPROVED> "require pointer increment to jump to \
2889  next Config */
2890  /*LDRA_INSPECTED 567 S */
2891  data++;
2892  }
2893  /* Send Command to mmWave Radar Device */
2894  retVal += rlDriverCmdInvoke(deviceMap, inMsg, &outMsg);
2895  loopCnt--;
2896 
2897  if (loopCnt == 0U)
2898  {
2899  break;
2900  }
2901  }
2902  }
2903  return retVal;
2904 }
